page.title: 17Cupar Trading Estate
page.content: Cupar Trading Estate is situated approx. 400m. to east of Cupar. It is on the site of the former Sugar Beet Factory. It is a serviced site, about 2.0 hectares with land & premises for lease. Firms which have taken up residence here are :_ Cupar Garden Centre, Prestige Homes, Firth Garages Ltd., Kingdom Property Preservation, Pendal Commercial Spares, Gillies & Henderson, Charles & Co. Closeby is the Prestonhall site, 2.3 hectares where the{S.D.A.}have built 2 advance factories. Both are occupied , one by Spittle Hydraulic Valves Ltd. Most of these firms are small with a labour force of less than 25. Between the Estate & Cupar, in a field, is Cupar's{Nuclear Fall Out Shelter.
